snippet: Musicians like Avicii, Martin Solveig, Zedd, Deadmau5 and Calvin Harris are trying to figure out if they can play by the rules of mainstream pop.
abstract: DJs and dance musicians like Avicii, Martin Solveig, Zedd, Deadmau5 and Calvin Harris are trying to figure out if they can play by the rules of mainstream pop as the popularity of the genre continues to grow and both fans and the music industry are taking notice.
lead_paragraph: Musicians like Avicii, Martin Solveig, Zedd, Deadmau5 and Calvin Harris are trying to figure out if they can play by the rules of mainstream pop.

headline.seo: Dance-Music Stars Evolve for Pop Fame
headline.main: Dance Stars Evolve for Pop Fame
headline.print_headline: Dance Stars Evolve For Pop Fame
